metadata.name: The Moon
metadata.description:
In the vast expanse of space so wide,  
Humanity dreamed of a place to reside,  
Where we could learn, work and thrive,  
And the Moon seemed the perfect hive.

With every step, we explored anew,  
The possibilities of what we could do,  
And we learned to harness the Moon's might,  
To create a world that shone so bright.

Water, the key to life's great quest,  
Was a challenge that we did address,  
And we dug to find it there,  
A precious resource, so pure and rare.

We built great cities, tall and proud,  
As we stood on the lunar ground,  
We flourished in the lunar light,  
With every new discovery and insight.

For on the Moon, we found a way,  
To work together and to play,  
To create a world that we could share,  
A place where humans mightily dare.

And so, we learned, we worked, we grew,  
As we took our first steps anew,  
On the Moon, humanity's extended home,  
A future that we all could call our own, 
Finally leaping out into the great unknown.
